dublin_core.dcvalue: To improve the completeness of reporting of mobile health mHealth interventions the WHO mHealth Technical Evidence Review Group developed the mHealth evidence reporting and assessment mERA checklist The development process for mERA consisted of convening an expert group to recommend an appropriate approach convening a global expert review panel for checklist development and pilot testing the checklist
Guidelines for Reporting of Health Interventions Using Mobile Phones: Mobile Health (mHealth) Evidence Reporting and Assessment (mERA) Checklist
